title: World War II London Blitz Diary, Volume 1
description: While hundreds of Messerschmitt war planes fly overhead and the sound of hundreds of bombs exploding, Ruby Side Thompsonâ€™s writes her personal during the terrifying World War Two London Blitz. Her diary is a true and detailed account of what she experienced during that horrific time. The diary chronicles Ruby's struggle to survive in the midst of a horrendous war, where London is bombed nightly. In this true account Ruby speaks frankly and honestly.
author: Ruby Side Thompson
